0: "We may transfer your personally identifiable information to other Time Inc. offices for internal management and administrative purposes on our behalf."
1: "Your personal data will be transferred to other Time Inc. offices where necessary for the performance or conclusion of our contractual obligations to you or for your benefit."

"transfers and disclosures of personally identifiable information may also be made where necessary for the establishment, exercise, or defense of legal claims, to protect the rights and property of Time Inc., our agents, customers, and others."
